112101.flavor: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.
112101.info: Whenever you lose a round, return this unit from the battlefield to your hand.
112101.infoRaw: Whenever you lose a round, return this unit from the battlefield to your hand.
112101.name: Ciri

112102.flavor: A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.
112102.info: Deploy, Melee: Destroy the highest unit(s) on an enemy row with a total of 15 or more power.
112102.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Destroy the highest unit(s) on an enemy row with a total of 15 or more power.
112102.name: Geralt: Igni

112103.flavor: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.
112103.info: Deploy: Destroy an enemy with 8 or more power.
112103.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Destroy an enemy with 8 or more power.
112103.name: Geralt of Rivia

112104.flavor: Men, the polite ones, at least, would call me a monster. A blood–drinking freak.
112104.info: Deploy: Damage all enemies on a row by 1. If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.
112104.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage all enemies on a row by 1. If any were destroyed, repeat this ability.
112104.name: Regis

112105.flavor: He becomes invisible at will. His glance hypnotizes into a deep sleep. He then drinks his fill, turns into a bat and flies off. Altogether uncouth.
112105.info: Deploy, Melee: Drain all boosts from an enemy.
112105.name: Regis: Higher Vampire

112106.flavor: I can take care of myself. Trust me.
112106.info: Deploy, Ranged: Reveal a random unit from your deck and damage an enemy by its power.
112106.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: <keyword=reveal>Reveal</keyword> a random unit from your deck and damage an enemy by its power.
112106.name: Triss Merigold

112107.flavor: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.
112107.info: After 2 turns, on turn end, destroy the highest unit on the battlefield, excluding self.
112107.infoRaw: After 2 turns, on turn end, destroy the highest unit on the battlefield, excluding self.
112107.name: Villentretenmerth

112108.flavor: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.
112108.info:
Deploy, Melee: Damage all other units by 2. 
Deploy, Ranged: Boost all other units by 2.
112108.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Damage all other units by 2. 
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Boost all other units by 2.
112108.name: Yennefer of Vengerberg

112109.flavor: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.
112109.info:
Deploy, Melee: Spawn and play Duda: Agitator.
Deploy, Ranged: Spawn and play Duda: Companion.
112109.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> and play Duda: Agitator.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> and play Duda: Companion.
112109.name: Zoltan: Scoundrel

112110.flavor: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.
112110.info: After 4 turns, on turn end, draw a card.
112110.infoRaw: After 4 turns, on turn end, draw a card.
112110.name: Ciri: Dash

112111.flavor: A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.
112111.info: Deploy, Melee: Damage 3 enemies by 2, and if possible, move them to the ranged row.
112111.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Damage 3 enemies by 2, and if possible, move them to the ranged row.
112111.name: Geralt: Aard

112112.flavor: Amongst the free elves were a handful of Aen Saevherne, or Sages. They were an enigma, bordering on a legend.
112112.info: Deploy, Ranged: Play an artifact from your deck.
112112.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Play an artifact from your deck.
112112.name: Avallac'h: Sage

112113.flavor: A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice… and when to conjure fire.
112113.info:
Order: Damage the highest enemy unit(s) by 1. 
Cooldown: 1.
112113.infoRaw:
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Damage the highest enemy unit(s) by 1. 
<keyword=cooldown>Cooldown</keyword>: 1.
112113.name: Yennefer: Conjurer

112201.flavor: A mimic, among the many other names for his sort: changelings, doublings, vexlings… or dopplers.
112201.info: Deploy: Transform into a base copy of an enemy unit.
112201.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Transform into a base copy of an enemy unit.
112201.name: Dudu

112202.flavor: I'm a simple witcher, Wolf. Don't fight dragons, don't fraternize with kings and don't sleep with sorceresses…
112202.info: Deploy: Summon Vesemir and Lambert from your deck to this row.
112202.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> Vesemir and Lambert from your deck to this row.
112202.name: Eskel

112203.flavor: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.
112203.info: Deploy: Summon Eskel and Lambert from your deck to this row.
112203.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> Eskel and Lambert from your deck to this row.
112203.name: Vesemir

112204.flavor: Now that's the kind of negotiating I understand.
112204.info: Deploy: Summon Eskel and Vesemir from your deck to this row.
112204.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> Eskel and Vesemir from your deck to this row.
112204.name: Lambert

112205.flavor: Never get between a mother dragon and her young.
112205.info:
Order: Damage an enemy by 2. 
Charge: 2.
112205.name: Myrgtabrakke

112206.flavor: The Master of Quartz Mountain, the Destroyer, Trajan's Slayer. In his free time, he likes long walks and candlelight dinners.
112206.name: Ocvist

112207.flavor: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.
112207.name: Olgierd von Everec

112208.flavor: As time and space collapse before us, they expand behind us. In that way one moves forward through both.
112208.info: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a base copy of a bronze unit from your hand to this row on each player's side.
112208.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> and <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> a base copy of a bronze unit from your hand to this row on each player's side.
112208.name: Operator

112210.flavor: Geralt, we gotta have a man–to–horse talk. No offense, but your riding skills? They leave a bit to be desired, buddy.
112210.info: Whenever you play a gold card, Summon this unit from your deck to a random allied row.
112210.infoRaw: Whenever you play a gold card, <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> this unit from your deck to a random allied row.
112210.name: Roach

112211.flavor: Life without savoring the sound of surreptitious shananacking is like licking snails through a cloth.
112211.info:
Order: Damage a unit by 2. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a special card.
112211.infoRaw:
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Damage a unit by 2. 
<keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>: 1.
Gain 1 <keyword=charge>Charge</keyword> whenever you play a special card.
112211.name: Johnny

112212.info:
Order: Boost a unit by 2. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a special card.
112212.infoRaw:
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Boost a unit by 2. 
<keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>: 1.
Gain 1 <keyword=charge>Charge</keyword> whenever you play a special card.
112212.name: Sarah

112213.flavor: I might just discover I look great without ears… or hands. Apparently the King of Beggars accepts both as partial payment.
112213.info: Every turn, on turn end, boost the lowest unit in your hand by 1.
112213.infoRaw: Every turn, on turn end, boost the lowest unit in your hand by 1.
112213.name: King of Beggars

112214.flavor: One of four bosses who control the city's underworld - the others being Sigi Reuven, Carlo The Cleaver Varese and the King of Beggars.
112214.info: Deploy: Banish a unit with 3 power or less.
112214.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=banish>Banish</keyword> a unit with 3 power or less.
112214.name: Cyprian Wiley

112215.flavor: I remember so little… Yet when I think of my rose, I begin to recall what was.
112215.info:
Deploy, Melee: Destroy an enemy artifact.
Deploy, Ranged: Clear all row effects from your side.
112215.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Destroy an enemy artifact.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Clear all row effects from your side.
112215.name: Iris von Everec

112401.flavor: They say unicorns are fond of virgins. Since finding a virgin these days is as hard as finding a unicorn, no one has been able to verify the theory.
112401.info: Deploy: Boost a unit by 4. If you have Chironex in hand, double that amount.
112401.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost a unit by 4. If you have Chironex in hand, double that amount.
112401.name: Unicorn

112402.flavor: Gods, that's no unicorn! That's…! – the last words of Vilemar, a famed collector of curiosities.
112402.info: Deploy: Damage a unit by 4. If you have Unicorn in hand, double that amount.
112402.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage a unit by 4. If you have Unicorn in hand, double that amount.
112402.name: Chironex

112403.flavor: Knows one hundred words – eighty of them curses, the rest, connectors.
112403.info: Boost all units on a row by 2.
112403.infoRaw: Boost all units on a row by 2.
112403.name: Duda: Companion

112404.flavor: Zoltan's parrot had the extraordinary ability to irritate anyone who spent time with it. Including Zoltan.
112404.info: Damage all units on a row by 2.
112404.infoRaw: Damage all units on a row by 2.
112404.name: Duda: Agitator

112405.flavor: A fiend looks a bit like a deer. An enormous, evil deer.
112405.info: Deploy: Boost all Deathwish units in your hand by 1.
112405.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost all <keyword=deathwish>Deathwish</keyword> units in your hand by 1.
112405.name: Fiend

113101.flavor: In the Final Age, Hemdall will come forth to face the evil issuing from the land of Morhogg – the legions of wraiths, demons and specters of Chaos.
113101.info:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
Every turn, on turn start, damage the highest unit on this row by 2.
113101.infoRaw:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
Every turn, on turn start, damage the highest unit on this row by 2.
113101.name: Ragh Nar Roog

113102.flavor: A djinn, good sirs, fulfills but three wishes. Thus freed, it flees to dimensions unknown.
113102.info: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, then play one and Banish the other.
113102.infoRaw: Look at the top 2 cards from your deck, then play one and <keyword=banish>Banish</keyword> the other.
113102.name: The Last Wish

113201.flavor: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.
113201.info: Shuffle an ally on the battlefield into your deck, then play the top unit from your deck.
113201.infoRaw: Shuffle an ally on the battlefield into your deck, then play the top unit from your deck.
113201.name: Decoy

113202.flavor: The sky dimmed of a sudden, and clouds amassed over the town. It grew fiendishly dark, and a cold gust swept in. Oh my, gasped Yennefer. We're about to make quite the mess, I think.
113202.name: Merigold's Hailstorm

113203.flavor: This ain't no normal storm. This here's the wrath of the gods.
113203.info:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 2 turns, on turn start, damage all units on this row by 1.
113203.infoRaw:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 2 turns, on turn start, damage all units on this row by 1.
113203.name: Skellige Storm

113204.flavor: The sorcerer Stammelford moved a mountain that obscured the view from his tower. Rumor has it he could only do so for he'd fettered a d'ao, an earth elemental.
113204.name: Stammelford's Tremors

113205.flavor: An important part of every Witch Hunter's kit. In one muted flash, it turns the most powerful sorcerer into pork jelly ripe for cutting.
113205.name: Dimeritium Bomb

113206.flavor: Behold Tedd Deireadh, the Final Age. The world destroyed by the White Frost.
113206.name: White Frost

113207.flavor: Plus one to morale, minus one to hearing.
113207.name: Commander's Horn

113208.flavor: The druid Vaedermakar controls the elements. He soothes storms into silence, musters destructive hail, summons lightning to turn foes into ash. So I advise you well… treat him with utmost respect.
113208.info:
Deploy, Melee: Increase all row effect durations by 1.
Deploy, Ranged: Decrease all row effect durations by 1.
113208.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Increase all row effect durations by 1.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Decrease all row effect durations by 1.
113208.name: Vaedermakar

113209.flavor: A few of Alzur's monstrous creations roam the world still. Not least among them the horrid viy, who massacred its mage-creator and destroyed half of Maribor before fleeing into Riverdell's gloomy woodland.
113209.info: Play the highest unit from your deck.
113209.infoRaw: Play the highest unit from your deck.
113209.name: Alzur's Double–Cross

113301.flavor: We stand not the slightest chance of incanting a spell so complex as Alzur's Thunder. It is claimed Alzur had a voice like a hunting horn and the diction of a master orator.
113301.name: Alzur's Thunder

113302.flavor: Best thing about frost? Bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.
113302.info:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 4 turns, on turn start, damage the lowest unit on this row by 2.
113302.infoRaw:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 4 turns, on turn start, damage the lowest unit on this row by 2.
113302.name: Biting Frost

113303.flavor: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope after all…
113303.info: Clear all row effects from your side.
113303.infoRaw: Clear all row effects from your side.
113303.name: Clear Skies

113305.flavor: A good commander's dream… and a bad one's horror.
113305.info:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 4 turns, on turn start, damage the highest unit on this row by 2.
113305.infoRaw:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 4 turns, on turn start, damage the highest unit on this row by 2.
113305.name: Impenetrable Fog

113306.flavor: Kills quicker than you can recite the Emperor of Nilfgaard's title in full.
113306.name: Manticore Venom

113307.flavor: The beast rushed at them wildly, with fury in its eyes, immune to pain and any strikes the defenders could land. Nothing stood to stop it…
113307.info: Give or remove Resilience from a unit.
113307.infoRaw: Give or remove <keyword=resilient>Resilience</keyword> from a unit.
113307.name: Adrenaline Rush

113308.flavor: Epidemics respect no persons, no borders.
113308.name: Epidemic

113309.flavor: Geralt took one step back. He'd seen men hit by Scorch before. Or more accurately, seen what remained of them afterwards.
113309.name: Scorch

113310.flavor: Symbolizing spring and rejuvenation, the swallow lent its name to this potion that accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal.
113310.name: Swallow

113311.flavor: The witcher's face changed… his mien turning inhuman, horrifying.
113311.info:
Zeal.
Order: Boost a unit by 2. 
Charge: 3.
113311.name: Thunderbolt

113312.flavor: Even the rain in this land smells vile.
113312.info:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 4 turns, on turn start, damage 2 random units on the row by 1.
113312.infoRaw:
Apply this row effect to an enemy row:
For 4 turns, on turn start, damage 2 random units on the row by 1.
113312.name: Torrential Rain

113313.flavor: Every man, woman and child in Skellige can split a foe with an axe. Only a select few can split enemy ears with a rage-filled cry.
113313.info: Deploy: Boost self by the amount an enemy is damaged.
113313.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost self by the amount an enemy is damaged.
113313.name: An Craite Warcrier

113315.flavor: Gaze long into the abyss, and the abyss will gaze back into you.
113315.info: Choose a unit. If it's boosted, damage it by double the amount boosted. If it's damaged, boost it by double the amount damaged.
113315.infoRaw: Choose a unit. If it's boosted, damage it by double the amount boosted. If it's damaged, boost it by double the amount damaged.
113315.name: Bekker's Dark Mirror

113316.info: Play a unit from your graveyard.
113316.infoRaw: Play a unit from your graveyard.
113316.name: Renew

113319.flavor: The mage's arms were twisted and bound behind his back. The Redanians gave the fetters a good shake. Terranova cried out, lurched, bent backwards, bowed forward, then retched and groaned. It was clear of what his manacles were made.
113319.info: Lock a unit and damage it by 3.
113319.infoRaw: <keyword=lock>Lock</keyword> a unit and damage it by 3.
113319.name: Dimeritium Shackles

113320.flavor: Eat enough of them, and the world will never be the same…
113320.info: Damage a unit by 3, then boost it by 9.
113320.infoRaw: Damage a unit by 3, then boost it by 9.
113320.name: Mardroeme

122101.flavor: I've not been a good father, I know, but… perhaps it's not too late.
122101.info: Order: Double an allied unit's Charge count.
122101.name: Bloody Baron

122102.flavor: A patriot… and a real pain in the rear.
122102.info:
Spying.
Deploy: Play the top 2 cards from your deck.
122102.infoRaw:
<keyword=spying>Spying</keyword>.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Play the top 2 cards from your deck.
122102.name: Vernon Roche

122103.flavor: That square should bear the names of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.
122103.info: Melee: While this unit is on the battlefield, all allied units with Orders gain Zeal.
122103.infoRaw: <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: While this unit is on the battlefield, all allied units with <keyword=order>Orders</keyword> gain <keyword=zeal>Zeal</keyword>.
122103.name: John Natalis

122107.flavor: Cap'n… our arrows, they've… they've got wings!
122107.info: Deploy: Boost a random unit in your hand by 4.
122107.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost a random unit in your hand by 4.
122107.name: Triss: Butterflies

122108.flavor: If I'm to die today, I wish to look smashing for the occasion.
122108.info: Deploy, Ranged: Play a Spell from your deck.
122108.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Play a Spell from your deck.
122108.name: Keira Metz

122201.flavor: Dandelion, you're a cynic, a lecher, a liar – and my best friend.
122201.info: Ranged: Whenever an ally gains a Charge, boost it by 1.
122201.infoRaw: <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Whenever an ally gains a <keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>, boost it by 1.
122201.name: Dandelion

122202.flavor: Picture Dandelion in a dress and you've got the general idea.
122202.info:
Zeal.
Order: Give a unit 1 Charge. 
Cooldown: 1.
122202.name: Priscilla

122203.flavor: Piss off! We aren't all philanderers. Some of us have depth…
122203.info:
Deploy: Remove all Charges from an enemy unit and give them to Thaler.
Order: Give 1 Charge to an allied unit.
Charge: 0.
122203.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Remove all <keyword=charge>Charges</keyword> from an enemy unit and give them to Thaler.
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Give 1 <keyword=charge>Charge</keyword> to an allied unit.
<keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>: 0.
122203.name: Thaler

122204.flavor: Better to live one day as a king than a whole life as a beggar.
122204.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy by 4.
Order: Give an ally Zeal.
122204.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 4.
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Give an ally <keyword=zeal>Zeal</keyword>.
122204.name: Ves

122205.flavor: The Lodge lacks humility. Our lust for power may yet be our undoing.
122205.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2.
Order: Damage an enemy by 2.
122205.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 2.
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 2.
122205.name: Síle de Tansarville

122206.flavor: The Daughter of the Kaedweni Wilderness.
122206.info:
Spying. 
Deathwish: Damage all units on this row by 3.
122206.infoRaw:
<keyword=spying>Spying</keyword>. 
<keyword=deathwish>Deathwish</keyword>: Damage all units on this row by 3.
122206.name: Sabrina Glevissig

122207.flavor: I once made a prisoner vomit his own entrails… Ah, good times…
122207.info: Order, Ranged: Damage an enemy by the amount Dethmold is boosted.
122207.infoRaw: <keyword=order>Order</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Damage an enemy by the amount Dethmold is boosted.
122207.name: Dethmold

122208.flavor: He wears armor made of gold. Of course he's a jerk.
122208.info: Deploy: Boost an ally by 2 and give it 2 Charges.
122208.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost an ally by 2 and give it 2 <keyword=charge>Charges</keyword>.
122208.name: Prince Stennis

122210.flavor: They said the queen was prone to outbursts, but I did not expect that…
122210.info: Deploy: Shuffle a bronze unit and all copies of it from your graveyard into your deck.
122210.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Shuffle a bronze unit and all copies of it from your graveyard into your deck.
122210.name: Princess Pavetta

122211.flavor: I care only about what's good for Aretuza and my pupils.
122211.info:
Zeal.
Order: Spend 3 Charges to Lock an enemy unit.
Charge: 3.
122211.name: Margarita Laux-Antille

122212.flavor: Few know more about healing than Nenneke.
122212.info:
Order, Ranged: Boost a unit by 1. 
Charge: 3.
122212.name: Nenneke

122213.flavor: Drinkin' without Odrin is like rowin' without a paddle.
122213.info: Deploy: Give 1 Charge to all allied units.
122213.name: Odrin

122214.flavor: Forward, you sorry sods! Forward or you'll see the Nilfgaardians are the least of your worries!
122214.info:
Zeal.
Order: Boost an ally by 1. 
Charge: 2.
122214.name: Kaedweni Sergeant

122216.flavor: Everyone wantin' to trade in Novigrad's got a clear choice - agree terms with Cleaver or kiss their knees farewell.
122216.info: Deploy: Damage a unit by 1 for every card in your hand.
122216.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage a unit by 1 for every card in your hand.
122216.name: Cleaver

122301.flavor: What crossbows want to be when they grow up.
122301.info:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
122301.name: Ballista

122302.flavor: Never manages to hit the same place twice, which, upon further reflection, might constitute a real problem.
122302.info:
Order: Damage a unit by 2. 
Charge: 1.
122302.name: Reinforced Ballista

122303.flavor: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!
122303.info:
Order, Ranged: Damage a unit by 1. If it was destroyed, damage units adjacent to it by 1.
Charge: 1.
122303.infoRaw:
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Damage a unit by 1. If it was destroyed, damage units adjacent to it by 1.
<keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>: 1.
122303.name: Trebuchet

122304.flavor: The latest rage in assaults on walled cities.
122304.info:
Order, Melee: Boost adjacent allies by 1. 
Charge: 1.
122304.name: Siege Tower

122309.flavor: You gotta recalibrate the arm by five degrees.\nDo what by the what now?
122309.info: Deploy: Give 2 Charges to a Machine ally.
122309.name: Siege Support

122310.flavor: Blue Stripes and Scoia'tael are similar in one regard – hatred fuels both.
122310.info: Deploy, Melee: Spawn a copy of a bronze ally at the bottom of your deck.
122310.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> a copy of a bronze ally at the bottom of your deck.
122310.name: Blue Stripes Scout

122311.flavor: I'd do anything for Temeria. Mostly though, I kill for her.
122311.info: Order: Summon all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
122311.infoRaw: <keyword=order>Order</keyword>: <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> all copies of this unit from your deck to this row.
122311.name: Blue Stripes Commando

122312.flavor: Stitch red to red, white to white, and everything will be all right.
122312.name: Field Medic

122313.flavor: Stay calm, everyone. And be alert. The true owners of those cloaks and beaver–skin caps might be elsewhere.
122313.info:
Deploy: Gain Zeal if played adjacent to 2 Soldiers.
Order: Damage an enemy by 3.
122313.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Gain <keyword=zeal>Zeal</keyword> if played adjacent to 2 Soldiers.
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 3.
122313.name: Dun Banner

122314.flavor: Always wondered – how the blazes do those lads handle nature's call…?
122314.info: Deploy, Melee: Remove all Charges from an enemy, then damage it by the amount removed.
122314.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Remove all <keyword=charge>Charges</keyword> from an enemy, then damage it by the amount removed.
122314.name: Kaedweni Cavalry

122315.flavor: Feel that? The earth trembles each time Big Bertha looses a stone.
122315.info: Ranged: Every turn, on turn end, damage a random enemy on the ranged row by 1.
122315.infoRaw: <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Every turn, on turn end, damage a random enemy on the ranged row by 1.
122315.name: Reinforced Trebuchet

122316.flavor: Temeria! Temeria! Gods shed all grace on thee! And smite thy foes with horrid woes, for all eternity!
122316.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1 for each boosted unit on this row.
122316.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 1 for each boosted unit on this row.
122316.name: Temerian Infantry

122318.info: Whenever a Machine is placed on this row, give it Zeal.
122318.infoRaw: Whenever a Machine is placed on this row, give it <keyword=zeal>Zeal</keyword>.
122318.name: Siege Master

122401.flavor: Admit your mistakes and bury them proper – else they'll come back to haunt you.
122401.info:
Every turn, on turn end, damage the highest enemy by 1. 
Order: Transfrom into Lubberkin.
122401.infoRaw:
Every turn, on turn end, damage the highest enemy by 1. 
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Transfrom into Lubberkin.
122401.name: Botchling

122402.flavor: I name thee Dea and embrace thee as my daughter.
122402.info:
Every turn, on turn end, boost the lowest ally by 1. 
Order: Transform into Botchling.
122402.infoRaw:
Every turn, on turn end, boost the lowest ally by 1. 
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Transform into Botchling.
122402.name: Lubberkin

122403.flavor: Mages in Nilfgaard are disposable. If one disappoints the Emperor, a dozen others await to provide what he requires.
122403.info: Deploy, Ranged: Draw a card, then place a card from your hand at the top of your deck.
122403.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Draw a card, then place a card from your hand at the top of your deck.
122403.name: Vicovaro Novice

123201.flavor: Sound the retreat! Regroup! And wait for reinforcements!
123201.info: Spawn a copy of a bronze allied unit and Summon it to this row.
123201.infoRaw: <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> a copy of a bronze allied unit and <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> it to this row.
123201.name: Reinforcements

131101.flavor: Have some dignity. You know how this will end.
131101.info: Order: Boost a unit by 4 and give it Immune.
131101.infoRaw: <keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Boost a unit by 4 and give it <keyword=immune>Immune</keyword>.
131101.name: Eredin Bréacc Glas

131102.flavor: Paintings should convey emotion, not words.
131102.info: Ranged: Whenever you play a unit with Deathwish, trigger its Deathwish ability.
131102.infoRaw: <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Whenever you play a unit with <keyword=deathwish>Deathwish</keyword>, trigger its <keyword=deathwish>Deathwish</keyword> ability.
131102.name: Ge'els

132101.flavor: Some men cannot admit defeat. Some keep fighting from beyond the grave.
132101.info: Deploy: Transform all Human allies into Kaedweni Revenants without changing their power.
132101.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Transform all Human allies into Kaedweni Revenants without changing their power.
132101.name: Draug

132102.flavor: He boasted that no weapon would ever pierce his armor. And he was right — even in death.
132102.info: Damage an enemy by the power of your highest ally.
132102.infoRaw: Damage an enemy by the power of your highest ally.
132102.name: Imlerith's Wrath

132103.flavor: We never hunt in these woods. Not even if it means the whole village'll starve.
132103.info: Order: Boost a unit in your hand by 8.
132103.infoRaw: <keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Boost a unit in your hand by 8.
132103.name: Woodland Spirit

132104.flavor: A favorite son who chose a life of villainy.
132104.info: Deploy: Spawn a 1-power copy of a unit from your hand and Summon it to this row.
132104.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> a 1-power copy of a unit from your hand and <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> it to this row.
132104.name: Caranthir Ar-Feiniel

132105.info: Order: Give an allied unit Immune.
132105.name: Avallac'h

132106.flavor: There are more things in heaven and earth than all the world's philosophers have dreamt.
132106.info: Deploy, Ranged: Play an artifact from your graveyard.
132106.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Play an artifact from your graveyard.
132106.name: Caretaker

132107.flavor: How to kill a kayran? Simple! Take your best sword… then sell it, and hire a witcher.
132107.info:
Zeal.
Order: Consume an ally.
Charge: 3.
132107.name: Kayran

132108.flavor: Why fight? There are much better ways to work off excess energy…
132108.info: Deathwish: Seize an enemy with 3 or less power.
132108.infoRaw: <keyword=deathwish>Deathwish</keyword>: <keyword=seize>Seize</keyword> an enemy with 3 or less power.
132108.name: Miruna

132201.flavor: Like a cross between a crab, a spider… and a mountain.
132201.info: Spawn 2 Arachas Drones and Summon them to this row, then boost all other Insectoids on this row by 1.
132201.infoRaw: <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> 2 Arachas Drones and <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> them to this row, then boost all other Insectoids on this row by 1.
132201.name: Arachas Behemoth

132202.flavor: Most grave hags feed on rotten remains dug out of graves. Yet some sneak into huts, steal children, kill the elderly and in general make very undesirable neighbors.
132202.info: Order: Banish all units in your graveyard, then boost self by 1 for each.
132202.infoRaw: <keyword=order>Order</keyword>: <keyword=banish>Banish</keyword> all units in your graveyard, then boost self by 1 for each.
132202.name: Mourntart

132203.flavor: Seen a lot o' ugly critters in me life – morays, lampreys, blobfish… But never nothin' like this!
132203.info:
Thrive. 
Deploy: Trigger a bronze ally's Deathwish ability.
132203.name: Abaya

132204.flavor: ”What have I done?” the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.
132204.info: After 3 allied units are destroyed, awaken Frightener.
132204.infoRaw: After 3 allied units are destroyed, awaken Frightener.
132204.name: Frightener: Dormant

132205.flavor: An unusual fiend specimen found on Ard Skellig. Unusually picky in terms of food.
132205.info: Deploy: Boost all Beast allies by 1.
132205.name: Morvudd

132206.flavor: I'd be your best – and last.
132206.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2.
Increase this damage by 2 whenever you play Brewess or Weavess.
132206.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 2.
Increase this damage by 2 whenever you play Brewess or Weavess.
132206.name: Whispess

132207.flavor: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you'll make.
132207.info:
Deploy: Consume 1 allied unit(s).
Increase the number of targets by 1 whenever you play Whispess or Weavess.
132207.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=consume>Consume</keyword> 1 allied unit(s).
Increase the number of targets by 1 whenever you play Whispess or Weavess.
132207.name: Brewess

132208.flavor: I sense your pain. I see your fear.
132208.info:
Deploy: Boost an ally by 2.
Increase this boost by 2 whenever you play Whispess or Brewess.
132208.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost an ally by 2.
Increase this boost by 2 whenever you play Whispess or Brewess.
132208.name: Weavess

132209.flavor: One of the world's oldest and deadliest monsters. I used to feel excitement at moments like this. Now the beast is only an obstacle in my way. Its meat and hot blood will help me survive this icy hell.
132209.name: Imperial Manticore

132210.flavor: Can't stand the heat? Then you don't stand a chance.
132210.info:
Zeal.
Order: Damage all units on the opposite row by 1.
Cooldown: 3.
132210.infoRaw:
<keyword=zeal>Zeal</keyword>.
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Damage all units on the opposite row by 1.
<keyword=cooldown>Cooldown</keyword>: 3.
132210.name: Colossal Ifrit

132211.flavor: Take heed, gents, there's nekkers under this here bridge.
132211.name: Nekker Warrior

132212.flavor: Fled one time in my life. From the Ice Giant. And I'm not a bit ashamed.
132212.name: Ice Giant

132213.flavor: How do you fight an earth elemental? You don't. You run. Fast as you can.
132213.name: Primordial D'ao

132214.flavor: Each Wild Hunt warrior has gone through a rigorous selection process, but Eredin's personal cavalcade includes only the most brutal and most ferocious of the Aen Elle.
132214.info: Deploy: Destroy an enemy artifact. If you control the highest unit, damage units adjacent to that artifact by 2.
132214.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Destroy an enemy artifact. If you control the highest unit, damage units adjacent to that artifact by 2.
132214.name: Nithral

132215.flavor: He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.
132215.info:
Deploy: Give an enemy unit Doomed.
Order: Destroy a Doomed enemy.
132215.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Give an enemy unit <keyword=doomed>Doomed</keyword>.
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Destroy a <keyword=doomed>Doomed</keyword> enemy.
132215.name: Gaunter O'Dimm

132216.flavor: Big, bad, ugly. Squats in the sewers.
132216.info: Deploy, Melee: Consume a unit with 3 or less power.
132216.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: <keyword=consume>Consume</keyword> a unit with 3 or less power.
132216.name: Toad Prince

132217.flavor: Common harpies feed on carrion. Celaeno harpies… they feed on dreams.
132217.name: Celaeno Harpy

132301.flavor: Fog creeps on little cat feet. Foglets creep over the bodies of their victims.
132301.info: Deathwish: Summon a copy of this unit from your deck to a random allied row.
132301.infoRaw: <keyword=deathwish>Deathwish</keyword>: <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> a copy of this unit from your deck to a random allied row.
132301.name: Foglet

132302.flavor: Many primal fears lurk in the hearts of men. The fear of the mist is well–founded…
132302.info: Deathwish: Summon this unit from the graveyard to the same row, boost it by 4, and give it Doomed.
132302.infoRaw: <keyword=deathwish>Deathwish</keyword>: <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> this unit from the graveyard to the same row, boost it by 4, and give it <keyword=doomed>Doomed</keyword>.
132302.name: Ancient Foglet

132303.flavor: Imagine a cross between a winged snake and a nightmare. Wyverns are worse.
132303.name: Wyvern

132304.flavor: Ugly – nature's way of saying stay away.
132304.name: Arachas Drone

132305.flavor: These little guys are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.
132305.info:
Thrive.
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of this unit and Summon it to this row.
132305.infoRaw:
<keyword=thrive>Thrive</keyword>.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> a base copy of this unit and <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> it to this row.
132305.name: Nekker

132306.flavor: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life… then it's one vicious circle.
132306.info: Deploy, Melee: Consume a unit in your graveyard.
132306.name: Ghoul

132307.flavor: Griffins like to toy with their prey. Eat 'em alive, piece by piece.
132307.info: Deploy: Destroy an allied unit on this row. If there are no units, destroy self.
132307.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Destroy an allied unit on this row. If there are no units, destroy self.
132307.name: Griffin

132308.flavor: They sat still on their horses, seemingly relaxed. He saw their weapons – short spears with wide tips. Swords with oddly forged guards. Battle axes. Toothed gisarmes.
132308.info: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, damage a random enemy by 1.
132308.infoRaw: Whenever a unit is destroyed during your turn, damage a random enemy by 1.
132308.name: Vran Warrior

132309.info: Deploy: Damage a unit by 1 for each Wild Hunt unit on this row.
132309.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage a unit by 1 for each Wild Hunt unit on this row.
132309.name: Wild Hunt Warrior

132310.flavor: First the buffalo horns atop their helms penetrate one's view, then the crest betwixt them, and finally the skull–like face exposed beneath their visors.
132310.info: Deploy: If you control the highest unit, Summon a copy of Wild Hunt Rider from your deck to this row.
132310.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: If you control the highest unit, <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> a copy of Wild Hunt Rider from your deck to this row.
132310.name: Wild Hunt Rider

132312.flavor: Afraid for the lives, the residents of Hengfors cowered behind thick city walls. A lot of good that did them...
132312.info: Each player destroys their lowest unit.
132312.infoRaw: Each player destroys their lowest unit.
132312.name: Predatory Dive

132314.flavor: Though the witchman lusts for gold, for the smiting of a drowner thou shalt give him but a silver penny, or three halfpence, at most.
132314.info:
Thrive.
Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2 and move it to the other row.
132314.infoRaw:
<keyword=thrive>Thrive</keyword>.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 2 and move it to the other row.
132314.name: Drowner

132315.flavor: There are many species of harpy, and all are kleptomaniacs.
132315.name: Harpy

132316.flavor: A harpy egg omelet - a delicious delicacy, good sir. Quite dear, too, for as you might surmise, the wretches don't part with their eggs willingly.
132316.info: Deathwish: Spawn a Harpy and Summon it to a random allied row.
132316.infoRaw: <keyword=deathwish>Deathwish</keyword>: <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> a Harpy and <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> it to a random allied row.
132316.name: Harpy Egg

132402.flavor: Cry 'Havoc!', and let slip the dogs of war.
132402.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1. If you control the highest unit, damage by 3 instead.
132402.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 1. If you control the highest unit, damage by 3 instead.
132402.name: Wild Hunt Hound

132403.flavor: Relax, I know how to tame wolves…– Dunbar the Hunter's last words.
132403.name: Wolf Pack

132404.flavor: A certain mage thought them cute. It was his fate that gave rise to the saying Don't play with fire…
132404.name: Enraged Ifrit

132405.flavor: They're easily mistaken for rocks. Many a troll's been unpleasantly surprised by gastric grief on that very account.
132405.name: Frenzied D'ao

132406.flavor: No gate nor wall can stop them. Just one tiny crack — that's all they need...
132406.info: Deploy: Trigger a bronze ally's Deathwish ability.
132406.name: Maerolorn

132407.flavor: The most powerful of Nilfgaard's mages have mastered the art of creating golems. On a few occasions, they've even managed to make them fight for the imperial cause…
132407.info: Deploy: Reveal the top unit from your opponent's deck and damage self by its power, then shuffle it back.
132407.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=reveal>Reveal</keyword> the top unit from your opponent's deck and damage self by its power, then shuffle it back.
132407.name: Imperial Golem

132408.flavor: Oh, you're in a heap of trouble now…
132408.name: Old Speartip

132409.flavor: The fool paid heed to superstition, stuffed his ears with wax and didn't hear the warnings. He ran his ship straight into the rocks.
132409.info: Damage an enemy by 3 and boost an ally by 3.
132409.infoRaw: Damage an enemy by 3 and boost an ally by 3.
132409.name: Hideous Feast

133301.flavor: Stronger than your average shield and far more stylish.
133301.info:
Zeal.
Order: Boost a unit by 1. 
Cooldown: 1.
133301.name: Wyvern Scale Shield

133302.flavor: Damn, the filth's o'errun us… We need a witcher or there's no livin' 'ere!
133302.info: Spawn 4 1-power Arachas Drones and Summon them to an allied row.
133302.infoRaw: <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> 4 1-power Arachas Drones and <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> them to an allied row.
133302.name: Arachas Nest

142101.flavor: I inherited my father's ability to assume other forms - well, one other form, in my case.
142101.info:
Immune.
Order: Remove this unit's Immune status for the remainder of the turn.
142101.infoRaw:
<keyword=immune>Immune</keyword>.
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Remove this unit's <keyword=immune>Immune</keyword> status for the remainder of the turn.
142101.name: Saesenthessis

142102.flavor: It dawns on them once they notice my scar: a realization of imminent death.
142102.info:
Deploy: Boost all other Elf allies by 1.
Whenever you play an Elf, boost self by 1.
142102.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost all other Elf allies by 1.
Whenever you play an Elf, boost self by 1.
142102.name: Isengrim Faoiltiarna

142103.flavor: King or beggar, what's the difference? One dh'oine less.
142103.info: Deploy: Return an allied Trap to your hand, then play a Trap.
142103.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Return an allied Trap to your hand, then play a Trap.
142103.name: Iorveth

142104.flavor: With each arrow I loose, I think of my da. He'd be proud. I think.
142104.info:
Immune.
Boost self by 1 whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit.
142104.infoRaw:
<keyword=immune>Immune</keyword>.
Boost self by 1 whenever you play a Scoia'tael unit.
142104.name: Milva

142105.flavor: Drinkin' alone's like crappin' with company.
142105.info: Deploy, Melee: Destroy a unit with power less than or equal to the number of Dwarf allies.
142105.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Destroy a unit with power less than or equal to the number of Dwarf allies.
142105.name: Zoltan Chivay

142106.flavor: Brokilon bleeds… and not even I can heal it.
142106.info: Deploy: On turn end, double the amount of boosts on self.
142106.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: On turn end, double the amount of boosts on self.
142106.name: Aglaïs

142107.flavor: Famed for constantly prophesying the world's doom. Not much fun at parties.
142107.info: Deploy: Boost a Scoia'tael unit in your hand by 4.
142107.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost a Scoia'tael unit in your hand by 4.
142107.name: Ithlinne Aegli

142108.flavor: Time to look death in the face.
142108.info:
Zeal.
Order: Destroy all other units with the same power as Schirrú.
142108.infoRaw:
<keyword=zeal>Zeal</keyword>.
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Destroy all other units with the same power as Schirrú.
142108.name: Schirrú

142201.flavor: I know how to execute orders, so take your advice somewhere else.
142201.info:
Deploy, Melee: Boost adjacent units by 2.
Deploy, Ranged: Boost all other units on this row by 1.
142201.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Boost adjacent units by 2.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Boost all other units on this row by 1.
142201.name: Dennis Cranmer

142202.flavor: I am a Sage. My power lies in possessing knowledge. Not sharing it.
142202.info:
Deploy, Melee: Destroy an artifact.
Deploy, Ranged: Boost a unit by 3.
142202.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Destroy an artifact.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Boost a unit by 3.
142202.name: Ida Emean aep Sivney

142203.flavor: We are the drops of rain that together make a ferocious storm.
142203.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1 for every Elf ally.
142203.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 1 for every Elf ally.
142203.name: Yaevinn

142204.flavor: I'd gladly kill you from up close, stare in your eyes… But you reek, human.
142204.info:
Deploy, Melee: Damage enemies at the ends of a row by 2.
Deploy, Ranged: Damage all enemies on a row by 1.
142204.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Damage enemies at the ends of a row by 2.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Damage all enemies on a row by 1.
142204.name: Toruviel

142205.flavor: Most terrible things I've witnessed? The Catriona plague, the razing of Vengerberg and the charge of the Vrihedd Dragoons.
142205.info:
Deploy, Melee: Move an enemy unit to their other row.
Deploy, Ranged: Move an allied unit to your other row.
142205.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Move an enemy unit to their other row.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Move an allied unit to your other row.
142205.name: Vrihedd Dragoon

142206.flavor: The path to freedom is paved in blood, not ink.
142206.info: Deploy: Lock a unit and move it to the other row.
142206.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=lock>Lock</keyword> a unit and move it to the other row.
142206.name: Ciaran aep Easnillen

142207.flavor: Our mead smells rotten to ye, do it? Easy to fix – I'll break yer nose!
142207.info: Deploy: Boost an ally by 1 for each Dwarf ally.
142207.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost an ally by 1 for each Dwarf ally.
142207.name: Barclay Els

142208.flavor: Lady Eithné's daughter had inherited her sublime beauty and her wild hatred for all that is human.
142208.info:
Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 2.
Deploy, Ranged: Lock a unit.
142208.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 2.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: <keyword=lock>Lock</keyword> a unit.
142208.name: Morenn

142209.flavor: Mona…? No… no. I'm Braenn. A daughter of Brokilon.
142209.info:
Deploy: If you control 2 or more Dryads, gain Zeal.
Order: Damage an enemy by 1.
Charge: 3.
142209.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: If you control 2 or more Dryads, gain <keyword=zeal>Zeal</keyword>.
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 1.
<keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>: 3.
142209.name: Braenn

142210.flavor: I hate you, dh'oine. You are all the same.
142210.info:
Order: Move a unit to the other row on its side.
Cooldown: 2.
142210.infoRaw:
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Move a unit to the other row on its side.
<keyword=cooldown>Cooldown</keyword>: 2.
142210.name: Malena

142211.flavor: Better to die standing than to live on bent knee.
142211.info: If on turn end you control 5 or more Elf allies, Summon this unit from your deck to the melee row.
142211.infoRaw: If on turn end you control 5 or more Elf allies, <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> this unit from your deck to the melee row.
142211.name: Aelirenn

142212.flavor: I was there, on the front lines! Right where the fightin' was the thickest!
142212.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy by this unit's power.
142212.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by this unit's power.
142212.name: Sheldon Skaggs

142213.flavor: Ever hear o' the dragon Ocvist? From Quartz Mountain? Well, Yarpen Zigrin and his band o' dwarves did 'im in.
142213.info: Every turn, on turn end, if there are no allied units on the battlefield, boost self by 3.
142213.infoRaw: Every turn, on turn end, if there are no allied units on the battlefield, boost self by 3.
142213.name: Yarpen Zigrin

142214.flavor: Love justifies madness in any of its forms.
142214.info: Deploy: Damage all damaged units by 1 and boost all boosted units by 1.
142214.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage all damaged units by 1 and boost all boosted units by 1.
142214.name: Ele'yas

142301.flavor: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you though.
142301.info:
Deploy, Melee: Boost an allied unit by 2.
Deploy, Ranged: Heal an allied unit by 4.
142301.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Boost an allied unit by 2.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: <keyword=heal>Heal</keyword> an allied unit by 4.
142301.name: Hawker Healer

142302.info:
Deploy: Damage a random enemy by 2.
Whenever Vrihedd Brigade is moved to the other row, repeat its Deploy ability.
142302.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage a random enemy by 2.
Whenever Vrihedd Brigade is moved to the other row, repeat its <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword> ability.
142302.name: Vrihedd Brigade

142303.flavor: Hatred burns brighter than any fire, and cuts deeper than any blade.
142303.info:
Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 3.
Deploy, Ranged: Boost an ally by 3.
142303.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 3.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Boost an ally by 3.

142304.flavor: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like heartless demons.
142304.info: Deploy: Damage a random enemy on each row by 2.
142304.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage a random enemy on each row by 2.
142304.name: Dol Blathanna Bomber

142305.flavor: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.
142305.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 3. If it survives, boost self by 1.
142305.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 3. If it survives, boost self by 1.
142305.name: Dwarven Skirmisher

142306.flavor: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle – we slash straight at their knees!
142306.info: Every turn, on turn end, boost self by 1 if this unit is boosted.
142306.infoRaw: Every turn, on turn end, boost self by 1 if this unit is boosted.
142306.name: Mahakam Defender

142307.flavor: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.
142307.info: Deploy: If you have an Elf in your hand, destroy an enemy artifact.
142307.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: If you have an Elf in your hand, destroy an enemy artifact.
142307.name: Vrihedd Sappers

142308.flavor: I spit on Scoia'tael ideals, but not on their coin.
142308.info: If there is an Elf ally on the battlefield, destroy a random enemy unit.
142308.infoRaw: If there is an Elf ally on the battlefield, destroy a random enemy unit.
142308.name: Waylay

142309.flavor: Temerians, Redanians, all the same. Better off dead.
142309.info: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each Elf in your hand.
142309.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost self by 1 for each Elf in your hand.
142309.name: Vrihedd Vanguard

142310.flavor: Take another step, dh'oine. You'd look better with an arrow between your eyes.
142310.info:
Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 2.
Deploy, Ranged: Damage 2 units by 1.
142310.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 2.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Damage 2 units by 1.
142310.name: Dol Blathanna Archer

142311.flavor: The key's mixin' pleasure an' business – like smackin' foes and gettin' coin for it.
142311.info:
Order: Damage an enemy by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Dwarf.
142311.infoRaw:
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 1. 
<keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>: 1.
Gain 1 <keyword=charge>Charge</keyword> whenever you play a Dwarf.
142311.name: Dwarven Mercenary

142312.flavor: Elf, dwarf, makes no difference – long as they've got coin.
142312.info: Deploy: Boost an ally by 1. If you control an artifact, boost by 3 instead.
142312.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost an ally by 1. If you control an artifact, boost by 3 instead.
142312.name: Hawker Support

142313.flavor: You mean to say the she–elf danced amidst the fray? Have you lost your mind, corporal?!
142313.info: Deploy: If this unit is already boosted, damage an enemy by 3.
142313.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: If this unit is already boosted, damage an enemy by 3.
142313.name: Elven Wardancer

142314.flavor: You might manage to hide from them, but once spotted, don't bother trying to run.
142314.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1 for each row that separates it from this unit.
142314.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 1 for each row that separates it from this unit.
142314.name: Dol Blathanna Bowman

142315.flavor: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.
142315.info: Melee: Every turn, on turn end, boost a random unit in your hand by 1.
142315.infoRaw: <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Every turn, on turn end, boost a random unit in your hand by 1.
142315.name: Hawker Smuggler

142316.flavor: By the time we'd heard them, it was already too late…
142316.info: Deploy, Melee: Damage an enemy by 4 if there are no other units on its row.
142316.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 4 if there are no other units on its row.
142316.name: Blue Mountain Elite

142317.flavor: Only one punishment for disturbin' the peace in Mahakam: a hammer to the heid.
142317.info: Deploy: Boost self by the number of Dwarf allies on the other row.
142317.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost self by the number of Dwarf allies on the other row.
142317.name: Mahakam Guard

142401.flavor: Many nonhumans, fed up with the racism and xenophobia they encounter in the cities, decide to join the Scoia'tael.
142401.info: Deploy: Spawn and Summon a base copy of this unit to the other allied row.
142401.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> and <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> a base copy of this unit to the other allied row.
142401.name: Scoia'tael Neophyte

143201.flavor: You exact from the earth a blood ransom, ripping out its riches by force. To us it bloomed, bore fruit and gave freely, for it loved us as we loved it.
143201.info: Ambush: Destroy the next special card played by your opponent before it triggers any abilities.
143201.infoRaw: <keyword=ambush>Ambush</keyword>: Destroy the next special card played by your opponent before it triggers any abilities.
143201.name: Serpent Trap

143301.flavor: Careful…! One more step and you'll be turned into molten glass.
143301.info:
Ambush: Damage the next unit your opponent plays by 5. 
Zeal.
Order: Flip over and damage a unit by 3.
143301.infoRaw:
<keyword=ambush>Ambush</keyword>: Damage the next unit your opponent plays by 5. 
<keyword=zeal>Zeal</keyword>.
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Flip over and damage a unit by 3.
143301.name: Incinerating Trap

152101.flavor: Instead of mournin' the fallen, let's drink to their memory!
152101.info: Deploy, Melee: Banish a unit in your graveyard and damage an enemy by its power.
152101.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: <keyword=banish>Banish</keyword> a unit in your graveyard and damage an enemy by its power.
152101.name: Hjalmar an Craite

152103.flavor: Only the ignorant dismiss the importance of myths.
152103.info: Deploy, Ranged: Play an Alchemy card from your deck.
152103.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Play an Alchemy card from your deck.
152103.name: Ermion

152104.flavor: When the time comes, the cockerel Kambi shall crow and awaken Hemdall.
152104.info: Deploy: Discard the rightmost card in your hand, then your opponent Discards the rightmost unit in their hand.
152104.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=discard>Discard</keyword> the rightmost card in your hand, then your opponent <keyword=discard>Discards</keyword> the rightmost unit in their hand.

152105.flavor: Skellige must have a strong king. No matter what it takes.
152105.info: Deploy: Draw 2 cards, then Discard 2 cards.
152105.name: Birna Bran

152106.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy by twice the number of damaged enemies.
152106.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by twice the number of damaged enemies.
152106.name: Madman Lugos

152107.flavor: Her true name's Astrid Lyttneyd Ásgeirrfinnbjornsdottir, but that never fit on any forms.
152107.info:
Order: Discard a card, then draw a card. 
Charge: 3.
Whenever you Discard a special card, damage an enemy by 2.
152107.infoRaw:
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: <keyword=discard>Discard</keyword> a card, then draw a card. 
<keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>: 3.
Whenever you <keyword=discard>Discard</keyword> a special card, damage an enemy by 2.
152107.name: Coral

152109.flavor: Merely mention this name to a Nilfgaardian, and they'll feel a spreading warmth in their knickers…
152109.info: Deploy, Melee: Damage all damaged enemies by 2.
152109.name: Wild Boar of the Sea

152201.flavor: I'm near ready to puke from boredom.
152201.info: Whenever this unit takes damage, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
152201.infoRaw: Whenever this unit takes damage, damage a random enemy unit by 2.
152201.name: Blueboy Lugos

152202.flavor: At close range, trolls never use weapons. And why would they?
152202.info:
Damage a unit by 5. 
Bloodthirst 3: Destroy a unit instead.
152202.infoRaw:
Damage a unit by 5. 
<keyword=bloodthirst>Bloodthirst</keyword> 3: Destroy a unit instead.
152202.name: Champion's Charge

152203.flavor: When a warrant says dead or alive, most bounty hunters'll just kill you. Not me. Should I catch you, you'll hang, and I'll tickle your feet as you expire.
152203.name: Djenge Frett

152204.flavor: I've gathered all the jarls together. Now make your case.
152204.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2.
Bloodthirst 2: Damage an enemy by 5 instead.
152204.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 2.
<keyword=bloodthirst>Bloodthirst</keyword> 2: Damage an enemy by 5 instead.
152204.name: Donar an Hindar

152205.flavor: Hear ye now the tale of the heroic deeds of Clan an Craite.
152205.info: Deploy: Boost all Warrior allies by 1.
152205.name: Draig Bon-Dhu

152206.flavor: An archdruid, a master of alchemy, and the grumpiest old fart in the Isles.
152206.info: Deploy, Ranged: Play a bronze Alchemy card from your graveyard.
152206.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Play a bronze Alchemy card from your graveyard.
152206.name: Gremist

152207.flavor: Now let's drink to the Emperor of Nilfgaard – may he die of somethin' hideous!
152207.info:
Whenever you play a Ship, boost it by 1.
Whenever you play a Pirate, damage a random enemy by 1.
152207.infoRaw:
Whenever you play a Ship, boost it by 1.
Whenever you play a Pirate, damage a random enemy by 1.
152207.name: Holger Blackhand

152208.flavor: Some call her the Iron Maiden.
152208.info: Deploy: If Jutta an Dimun is the highest unit, damage self by 6.
152208.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: If Jutta an Dimun is the highest unit, damage self by 6.
152208.name: Jutta an Dimun

152209.flavor: The vilest man Skellige's ever known.
152209.info: When this unit moves to the graveyard, Summon it to the melee row and give it Doomed.
152209.infoRaw: When this unit moves to the graveyard, <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> it to the melee row and give it <keyword=doomed>Doomed</keyword>.
152209.name: Morkvarg

152210.flavor: Tame? Och, lad, Skelligers might train bears, but that don't at all mean they tame 'em…
152210.info:
Zeal.
Deploy: Gain 1 Charge for each Savage Bear in the graveyard.
Order: Damage a unit by 2.
Charge: 1.
152210.infoRaw:
<keyword=zeal>Zeal</keyword>.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Gain 1 <keyword=charge>Charge</keyword> for each Savage Bear in the graveyard.
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Damage a unit by 2.
<keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>: 1.
152210.name: Savage Bear

152211.flavor: Fall on your knees and beg Modron Freya for forgiveness.
152211.info: Summon a Warrior from your graveyard to an allied row.
152211.infoRaw: <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> a Warrior from your graveyard to an allied row.

152213.flavor: The emperor also thought him an accidental king. At first.
152213.name: Svanrige Tuirseach

152214.flavor: The gods have spoken: a sacrifice is required.
152214.info:
Order: Damage a unit by 1.
Charge: 3.
Bloodthirst 2: Gain Zeal.
152214.name: Udalryk an Brokvar

152303.flavor: Our clan's bards will sing of my deeds long after you're dead and forgotten!
152303.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 2. If played from the graveyard, damage it by 4 instead.
152303.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 2. If played from the graveyard, damage it by 4 instead.

152304.flavor: Better believe we can hunt. Thing is, not much game on Spikeroog…
152304.info:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you Discard a card.
152304.infoRaw:
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Damage a unit by 1. 
<keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>: 1.
Gain 1 <keyword=charge>Charge</keyword> whenever you <keyword=discard>Discard</keyword> a card.
152304.name: Brokvar Hunter

152305.flavor: Can see the fear in their eyes. Fear o' me… fear o' Clan Dimun!
152305.info: Deploy: Move the top card in your deck to your graveyard.
152305.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Move the top card in your deck to your graveyard.

152306.flavor: Haul together, hoist the colors high!
152306.info: Deploy, Bloodthirst 2: Damage an enemy by 3.
152306.name: Dimun Pirate Captain

152307.flavor: The queen is guarded by the hardiest and fiercest shieldmaidens Skellige's ever known.
152307.info: Order: If this unit is damaged, Spawn a base copy of it and Summon it to the right.
152307.infoRaw: <keyword=order>Order</keyword>: If this unit is damaged, <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> a base copy of it and <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> it to the right.
152307.name: Drummond Queensguard

152308.flavor: The deeds of Clan Heymaey will go down in history.
152308.info: Deploy: Discard a card, then draw a card.
152308.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=discard>Discard</keyword> a card, then draw a card.
152308.name: Heymaey Skald

152309.flavor: Escape them? In the waters of Skellige? Good luck.
152309.info:
Order: Damage self and an enemy by 1. 
Cooldown: 1.
152309.infoRaw:
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Damage self and an enemy by 1. 
<keyword=cooldown>Cooldown</keyword>: 1.
152309.name: Dimun Light Longship

152310.flavor: Modron Freya, the Great Mother, is the goddess of love, beauty and bounty.
152310.info: Play a bronze unit from your graveyard.
152310.infoRaw: Play a bronze unit from your graveyard.
152310.name: Freya's Blessing

152311.flavor: Remember me words – a good shield can save yer life.
152311.info:
Order: Boost an ally by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Warrior.
152311.infoRaw:
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Boost an ally by 1. 
<keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>: 1.
Gain 1 <keyword=charge>Charge</keyword> whenever you play a Warrior.
152311.name: An Craite Blacksmith

152312.flavor: Swords are for wenches. Get yourself an axe.
152312.info: Deploy, Melee: Destroy an enemy with half or less than half of its base power.
152312.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Destroy an enemy with half or less than half of its base power.

152313.flavor: Friends we show heart, foes we show our axe. Remember that.

152313.infoRaw: When this unit is <keyword=discard>Discarded</keyword>, <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> it from your graveyard to the melee row.
152313.name: Tuirseach Skirmisher

152314.flavor: They say Hemdall's heart swells whenever the longships sail out on a raid.
152314.info: Whenever your opponent plays a unit, damage it by 1.
152314.infoRaw: Whenever your opponent plays a unit, damage it by 1.
152314.name: An Craite Longship

152315.flavor: So ye can hit a movin' target at two hundred paces? Me, too. In a storm.
152315.info: Deploy, Ranged: Damage an enemy by the amount of damaged units on their side.
152315.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Damage an enemy by the amount of damaged units on their side.
152315.name: Brokvar Archer

152316.flavor: Man or tree, a Skelligan axe fells it all the same.
152316.info:
Damage a unit by 4. 
Bloodthirst 2: Damage a unit by 6 instead.
152316.infoRaw:
Damage a unit by 4. 
<keyword=bloodthirst>Bloodthirst</keyword> 2: Damage a unit by 6 instead.
152316.name: Gutting Slash

152317.info: Deploy: Boost an ally by 1. If it's a Warrior, boost it by 3 instead.
152317.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost an ally by 1. If it's a Warrior, boost it by 3 instead.
152317.name: An Craite Armorsmith

152318.flavor: They'll shatter on our shields like waves on a craggy shore.
152318.info: The next time this unit takes damage, Summon a copy of it from your deck to this row.
152318.infoRaw: The next time this unit takes damage, <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> a copy of it from your deck to this row.
152318.name: Drummond Shieldmaiden

152403.flavor: Ehh, too big for a humpback. That's a finback. A finback? With a snout that short? Those herbs've gone to your head!
152403.info: Split 6 damage randomly between all units on an enemy row.
152403.infoRaw: Split 6 damage randomly between all units on an enemy row.
152403.name: Delirium

152405.flavor: We're going on a bear hunt! We're going to catch a–– THAT THING'S HUGE! RUN!
152405.name: Elder Bear

152406.info: Deploy: Damage an ally to the left by 1. If there is no ally, damage self by 1 instead.
152406.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an ally to the left by 1. If there is no ally, damage self by 1 instead.
152406.name: Raging Bear

153201.flavor: Those cursed sorceresses are stealing our thunder! Whyever should folk choose a procedure taking several hours, when some perfumed tart can solve their problem with a wave of her hand?
153201.info: Heal all units on a row.
153201.name: Restore

153301.flavor: A sight more horrid you've never seen… The poor soul lay shredded as the beast lapped up its blood from the ground all around.
153301.info: Damage all units on a row by 2.
153301.infoRaw: Damage all units on a row by 2.
153301.name: Lacerate

162101.flavor: Witchers never die in their beds.
162101.info: Deploy: Remove all redraws from the enemy Leader.
162101.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Remove all redraws from the enemy Leader.
162101.name: Letho of Gulet

162102.flavor: I'll take an attentive reconnaissance unit over a fine brigade any day.
162102.info: Deploy, Ranged: Play a Tactic card from your deck.
162102.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Play a Tactic card from your deck.
162102.name: Menno Coehoorn

162103.flavor: There's never been a problem a well–planned assassination couldn't solve.
162103.info: Order, Melee: Seize a Locked enemy unit.
162103.name: Vattier de Rideaux

162104.flavor: His eyes flashed under his winged helmet. Fire gleamed from his sword's blade.
162104.info: Melee: Whenever an enemy receives a boost, boost self by the same amount.
162104.infoRaw: <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Whenever an enemy receives a boost, boost self by the same amount.
162104.name: Cahir Dyffryn

162105.flavor: We are all pawns on his board. Playing a game whose rules we do not know.
162105.info:
Deploy, Melee: Destroy an enemy unit, then your opponent Summons the top unit from their deck to a random enemy row.
Deploy, Ranged: Destroy an allied unit, then Summon the top unit from your deck to a random allied row.
162105.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Destroy an enemy unit, then your opponent <keyword=summon>Summons</keyword> the top unit from their deck to a random enemy row.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Destroy an allied unit, then <keyword=summon>Summon</keyword> the top unit from your deck to a random allied row.
162105.name: Vilgefortz

162106.flavor: My mark scars the face of our future empress. That is my proudest achievement.
162106.info: Order: Spawn and play a copy of a Tactic card you played on this turn.
162106.infoRaw: <keyword=order>Order</keyword>: <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> and play a copy of a Tactic card you played on this turn.
162106.name: Stefan Skellen

162107.flavor: Tibor's zeal was legendary. It was said when the emperor passed, he'd not so much bow as somersault.
162107.info: Deploy: Your opponent Summons the top unit from their deck to a random enemy row.
162107.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Your opponent <keyword=summon>Summons</keyword> the top unit from their deck to a random enemy row.
162107.name: Tibor Eggebracht

162108.flavor: Astrology, hydromancy, haruspicy, ceromancy. Ovomancy, spodomancy, metroscopy, brontoscopy…
162108.info: Deploy: Reveal a random card in your deck. If it's a unit, boost self by its power and shuffle it back. If it's an artifact or a special card, play it.
162108.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=reveal>Reveal</keyword> a random card in your deck. If it's a unit, boost self by its power and shuffle it back. If it's an artifact or a special card, play it.
162108.name: Xarthisius

162201.flavor: A ball of fire? Why, naturally. Whatsoever Your Imperial Majesty desires.
162201.info: Deploy, Ranged: Move any card from your deck to the top. If it's a unit, boost it by 2.
162201.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Move any card from your deck to the top. If it's a unit, boost it by 2.
162201.name: Albrich

162202.flavor: Nilfgaardian mages do have a choice: servile submission, or the gallows.
162202.info:
Deploy, Melee: Shuffle a card from the opponent's graveyard into their deck.
Deploy, Ranged: Shuffle a card from your graveyard into your deck.
162202.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Shuffle a card from the opponent's graveyard into their deck.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Shuffle a card from your graveyard into your deck.
162202.name: Assire var Anahid

162203.flavor: Cynthia's talents can be deadly. She needs a tight leash.
162203.info: Deploy, Melee: Spawn The Guardian and place it at the top of your opponent's deck.
162203.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> The Guardian and place it at the top of your opponent's deck.
162203.name: Cynthia

162204.flavor: These are not the hands of an Excellency, but of a farmer. So we speak peasant to peasant.
162204.info: Deploy: Restore a unit to its base power.
162204.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Restore a unit to its base power.
162204.name: Peter Saar Gwynleve

162205.flavor: Magic is the highest good. It transcends all borders and divisions.
162205.info: Order: Reveal a random special card from your opponent's deck, then Spawn and play a copy of it.
162205.infoRaw: <keyword=order>Order</keyword>: <keyword=reveal>Reveal</keyword> a random special card from your opponent's deck, then <keyword=spawn>Spawn</keyword> and play a copy of it.
162205.name: Fringilla Vigo

162206.flavor: And hands off the girl! Whatever we may be, we're not savages.
162206.info:
Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1.
Increase this unit's damage by 1 for each card you have Revealed.
162206.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 1.
Increase this unit's damage by 1 for each card you have <keyword=reveal>Revealed</keyword>.
162206.name: Sweers

162207.flavor: For a fire mage, he's not very… flamboyant.
162207.info: Deploy, Ranged: Destroy a Locked enemy unit.
162207.name: Vanhemar

162208.flavor: Letho's got a plan… what could go wrong?
162208.info:
Deploy: Lock an enemy unit.
If Serrit is in your hand, Lock all copies of that unit in the opponent's hand, deck, and on their side of the battlefield.
162208.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: <keyword=lock>Lock</keyword> an enemy unit.
If Serrit is in your hand, <keyword=lock>Lock</keyword> all copies of that unit in the opponent's hand, deck, and on their side of the battlefield.
162208.name: Auckes

162209.flavor: We do what we must. I am not ashamed of that.
