202064.flavor: It's not reason I'm devoid of, just emotion.
202064.info:
Order, Melee: Damage an enemy by 2.
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a Witcher.
202064.infoRaw:
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 2.
<keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>: 1.
Gain 1 <keyword=charge>Charge</keyword> whenever you play a Witcher.
202064.name: Ivo of Belhaven

202098.flavor: The Good Book says the world is a garden which the gods once conferred upon man. And we men have this garden neglected!
202098.info:
Deploy: If you have a Dragon in your hand, gain Zeal.
Order: Destroy a unit with 8 or more power.
202098.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: If you have a Dragon in your hand, gain <keyword=zeal>Zeal</keyword>.
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Destroy a unit with 8 or more power.
202098.name: Eyck of Denesle

202099.flavor: Th' Strays of Spalla – 'tis you who lead them? 'Tis you they call the Duke of Dogs?
202099.info: Deploy, Melee: Boost self by a random amount between 0 and 11.
202099.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Boost self by a random amount between 0 and 11.
202099.name: Gascon

202100.flavor: The boy's not fit to wear the crown. Hasn't sufficient wit nor valor. I know this, you know this… just, he knows it not.
202100.info:
Spying.
Deploy: Play a random gold card from your deck.
202100.infoRaw:
<keyword=spying>Spying</keyword>.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Play a random gold card from your deck.
202100.name: Prince Villem

202101.flavor: Your Majesty… For the queen to question commoners, why, it's simply not proper…
202101.info: Every turn, on turn end, move to the row with the highest unit on the battlefield.
202101.infoRaw: Every turn, on turn end, move to the row with the highest unit on the battlefield.
202101.name: Count Caldwell

202102.flavor: Your engineer's got a pate like stewed meat, but he kens his trade, that's for certain.
202102.info:
Deploy, Melee: Banish all cards in your opponent's graveyard.
Deploy, Ranged: Banish all cards in your graveyard.
202102.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: <keyword=banish>Banish</keyword> all cards in your opponent's graveyard.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: <keyword=banish>Banish</keyword> all cards in your graveyard.
202102.name: Xavier Lemmens

202103.flavor: When he took roost here, they fought 'im for near a century. Then the dragon got weary o' fightin' and they realized he weren't goin' nowheres, so… they cut a deal. He dinnae bother 'em, they give 'im what he needs.
202103.info: Melee: Every turn, on turn end, destroy the lowest unit on the side with the most units.
202103.infoRaw: <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Every turn, on turn end, destroy the lowest unit on the side with the most units.
202103.name: Keltullis

202104.flavor: ”What have I done?” the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.
202104.name: Frightener: Awake

202105.flavor: The swamp underfoot suddenly exploded with a powerful splash. Two long, mantis-like forelimbs bristling with spikes shot out from the murk. The monstrous, green hooks seized an unlucky footman, dragging him beneath the water's surface.
202105.info: Deploy: Destroy all units with 1 power. For each unit destroyed, boost self by 2.
202105.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Destroy all units with 1 power. For each unit destroyed, boost self by 2.
202105.name: Glustyworp

202106.flavor: Brouver Hoog wanted to kick him out of Mahakam once for having a llama in his living room… it's a long story.
202106.info:
Deploy, Melee: Gain Resilience.
Deploy, Ranged: Gain Immune.
Whenever you play a Dwarf, boost self by 1.
202106.infoRaw:
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Gain <keyword=resilient>Resilience</keyword>.
<keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Gain <keyword=immune>Immune</keyword>.
Whenever you play a Dwarf, boost self by 1.
202106.name: Gabor Zigrin

202107.flavor: Arrived here with his peddler's wagon full o' tricks an' gadgets. Went from house tae house, praised his rubbish tae the high heavens. An' what's it he sold us? Bombs that go off in yer hand! Beard-growth formula that makes yer hair catch fire!
202107.info: Deploy: Boost an Elf, Dwarf, and Dryad ally by 2.
202107.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost an Elf, Dwarf, and Dryad ally by 2.
202107.name: Barnabas Beckenbauer

202108.flavor: I promised I would never again use magic to harm others.
202108.info: Order, Ranged: Look at the top card from both decks. Keep one and give the other to your opponent.
202108.infoRaw: <keyword=order>Order</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Look at the top card from both decks. Keep one and give the other to your opponent.
202108.name: Isbel of Hagge

202109.flavor: The coast's picked clean since long! So we set our longships up the Yaruga – for gold and glory!
202109.info: Deploy, Ranged: Swap your graveyard with your deck.
202109.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Swap your graveyard with your deck.
202109.name: Lippy Gudmund

202110.info: Melee: Whenever an enemy takes damage, boost self by 1.
202110.infoRaw: <keyword=melee>Melee</keyword>: Whenever an enemy takes damage, boost self by 1.
202110.name: Dagur Two Blades

202111.flavor: The Nilfgaardians proceeded in the queen's very direction without a sign of panic. The man leading the Nilfgaardians was clad in rich robes. He exuded pride... and the scent of musk.
202111.info: Deploy: Look at the top 3 cards in your opponent's deck and move 1 to their graveyard.
202111.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Look at the top 3 cards in your opponent's deck and move 1 to their graveyard.
202111.name: Traheaern var Vdyffir

202112.flavor: Under your husband I served ten years, under you another eight. And never in that time did I fight for a more worthy cause.
202112.info: Whenever an allied unit with Charge is played, give it 1 Charge.
202112.infoRaw: Whenever an allied unit with <keyword=charge>Charge</keyword> is played, give it 1 <keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>.
202112.name: Reynard Odo

202113.flavor: Exceptions are a clear road to human blood spilt. All Scoia'tael must die. Leave the gods to sort the wheat from the chaff.
202113.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy by the number of Human allies.
202113.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by the number of Human allies.
202113.name: Black Rayla

202114.flavor: What came first, the chicken or the egg? Compared to the conundrum that is the phoenix, that question seems downright trivial.
202114.info:
Doomed. Zeal.
Order: Transform into Phoenix.
202114.name: Phoenix Hatchling

202121.info: Deploy: Move a unit to the other row.
202121.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Move a unit to the other row.
202121.name: Strays of Spalla

202122.flavor: Knew a young couple once—got separated right after the weddin'. Bomb in the carriage'll do that.
202122.name: Bomb Heaver

202148.flavor: My king enjoys life... enjoys pleasures and indulges often. But none of this has hindered his ability to govern the realm bloody well.
202148.info:
Order: Give 1 Charge to a unit. 
Cooldown: 2.
202148.name: King Demavend III

202149.flavor: Don't matter if it crawls, slithers, climbs—you name it, I've eaten it. As for things that fly... I once ate a kite just 'cause it had flour stuck to it.
202149.info: Order: Play a random artifact from your opponent's deck.
202149.infoRaw: <keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Play a random artifact from your opponent's deck.
202149.name: Angoulême

202150.flavor: It's been near half a century since I last practiced medicine. The years haven't been kind to my memory... Nor the dexterity of my fingers.
202150.info:
Zeal.
Order, Ranged: Boost a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever either player plays a card.
202150.infoRaw:
<keyword=zeal>Zeal</keyword>.
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>, <keyword=ranged>Ranged</keyword>: Boost a unit by 1. 
<keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>: 1.
Gain 1 <keyword=charge>Charge</keyword> whenever either player plays a card.
202150.name: Vysogota of Corvo

202151.flavor: From afar, he looks like a bear. From up close, well... A larger bear.
202151.info: Deploy, Melee: Destroy an enemy unit with Orders.
202151.name: Falibor

202152.flavor: Anna hated her husband so much that she was ready to do anything in order to be free of the man — and the child he had put inside her.
202152.info: If on turn end this unit is boosted, boost adjacent units by 1.
202152.infoRaw: If on turn end this unit is boosted, boost adjacent units by 1.
202152.name: Anna Strenger

202153.flavor: A horseman's worth no less than his steed. And Lyrian horses are among the Continent's best.
202153.info: Whenever you play a unit with Orders, boost self by 1.
202153.infoRaw: Whenever you play a unit with <keyword=order>Orders</keyword>, boost self by 1.
202153.name: Lyrian Cavalry

202154.flavor: Get off your high horse and face me!
202154.info: Deploy: Damage an enemy by 1. If it was destroyed, damage another enemy by 3.
202154.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Damage an enemy by 1. If it was destroyed, damage another enemy by 3.
202154.name: Rivian Pikeman

202155.flavor: I can find the bull's-eye from a hundred paces! Perhaps not with my first shot, mind you...
202155.info:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1.
Gain 1 Charge whenever you play a card with Orders.
202155.infoRaw:
<keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Damage a unit by 1. 
<keyword=charge>Charge</keyword>: 1.
Gain 1 <keyword=charge>Charge</keyword> whenever you play a card with <keyword=order>Orders</keyword>.
202155.name: Lyrian Arbalest

202156.flavor: Best not laugh at their silly-arse hats. Believe me.
202156.info: Order: Damage a unit by 1. If Lyrian Landsknecht is boosted, damage a unit by 3 instead.
202156.infoRaw: <keyword=order>Order</keyword>: Damage a unit by 1. If Lyrian Landsknecht is boosted, damage a unit by 3 instead.
202156.name: Lyrian Landsknecht

202161.flavor: Our folk they feed, and our foes they bleed.
202161.info: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted ally.
202161.infoRaw: <keyword=deploy>Deploy</keyword>: Boost self by 1 for each boosted ally.
202161.name: Lyrian Scytheman

ambush.raw: <#600101>Ambush:</color> Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met.
ambush.text: Ambush: Played face down, then flips over when the ability's condition is met.

armor.raw: <#600101>Armor:</color> Absorbs a given amount of damage, then is removed.
armor.text: Armor: Absorbs a given amount of damage, then is removed.

aura.raw: <#600101>Aura:</color> Passive ability that is undone when the unit is destroyed or Locked.
aura.text: Aura: Passive ability that is undone when the unit is destroyed or Locked.

banish.raw: <#600101>Banish:</color> Remove from the game. Does not trigger Deathwish abilities.
banish.text: Banish: Remove from the game. Does not trigger Deathwish abilities.

banish_in_graveyard.raw: <#600101>Doomed:</color> Units: Remove from the game when moved from the Board to the Graveyard.\nSpecial Cards: Remove from the game after triggering the card's ability.
banish_in_graveyard.text: Doomed: Units: Remove from the game when moved from the Board to the Graveyard.\nSpecial Cards: Remove from the game after triggering the card's ability.

bloodthirst.raw: <#600101>Bloodthirst:</color> Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.
bloodthirst.text: Bloodthirst: Number of damaged enemy units required to trigger this ability.

bond.raw: <#600101>Bond:</color> Trigger this ability each time a copy of this Unit is played on the same side.
bond.text: Bond: Trigger this ability each time a copy of this Unit is played on the same side.

boon.raw: <#600101>Boon:</color> Positive row effect. Replaced by other row effects and removed on round end.
boon.text: Boon: Positive row effect. Replaced by other row effects and removed on round end.

boost.text: Boost: Increase a Unit's current Power.

boosted.raw: <#600101>Boosted:</color> A Boosted Unit's current Power is more than its base Power.
boosted.text: Boosted: A Boosted Unit's current Power is more than its base Power.

brave.raw: <#600101>Brave:</color> Trigger this ability if your opponent is winning the current Round (calculated after placing this Unit and any Units it Spawns).
brave.text: Brave: Trigger this ability if your opponent is winning the current Round (calculated after placing this Unit and any Units it Spawns).

charge.raw: <#600101>Charge:</color> The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
charge.text: Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.

charm.raw: <#600101>Charm:</color> Move an enemy to the opposite row.
charm.text: Charm: Move an enemy to the opposite row.

clone.raw: <#600101>Clone:</color> An exact copy of a card, with the same current Power and abilities.
clone.text: Clone: An exact copy of a card, with the same current Power and abilities.

conceal.raw: <#600101>Conceal:</color> Turn over a face-up card in hand.
conceal.text: Conceal: Turn over a face-up card in hand.

consume.raw: <#600101>Consume:</color> Eat a unit and boost by its power. If it's on the battlefield, destroy it. If in hand or deck, move it to the graveyard. If in the graveyard, remove it from the game.
consume.text: Consume: Eat a unit and boost by its power. If it's on the battlefield, destroy it. If in hand or deck, move it to the graveyard. If in the graveyard, remove it from the game.

cooldown.raw: <#600101>Cooldown:</color> The number of turns before an Order ability can be reused.
cooldown.text: Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order ability can be reused.

counter.raw: <#600101>Counter:</color> Reduce the Counter whenever the given condition is met. Reset the Counter when the Unit leaves the Board.
counter.text: Counter: Reduce the Counter whenever the given condition is met. Reset the Counter when the Unit leaves the Board.

craven.raw: <#600101>Craven:</color> Trigger this ability if your opponent is losing the current Round.
craven.text: Craven: Trigger this ability if your opponent is losing the current Round.

create.raw: <#600101>Create:</color> Spawn one of three randomly chosen cards from a specified faction and from neutral cards, unless otherwise specified.
create.text: Create: Spawn one of three randomly chosen cards from a specified faction and from neutral cards, unless otherwise specified.

crew.raw: <#600101>Crew:</color> This unit triggers the ability of Crewed units played adjacent to it.
crew.text: Crew: This unit triggers the ability of Crewed units played adjacent to it.

crewed.raw: <#600101>Crewed:</color> When played, trigger this ability once for each adjacent Crew unit.
crewed.text: Crewed: When played, trigger this ability once for each adjacent Crew unit.

damage.text: Damage: Decrease a Unit's current Power.

damaged.raw: <#600101>Damaged:</color> A Damaged Unit's current Power is less than its base Power.
damaged.text: Damaged: A Damaged Unit's current Power is less than its base Power.

deadlock.raw: <#600101>Clash:</color> Trigger this ability only if neither player has passed.
deadlock.text: Clash: Trigger this ability only if neither player has passed.

deathwish.raw: <#600101>Deathwish:</color> Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard.
deathwish.text: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Units that are Banished are not sent to the graveyard.

demote.raw: <#600101>Demote:</color> Convert a Gold card to Silver (or Bronze, if Bronze was the card's original color).
demote.text: Demote: Convert a Gold card to Silver (or Bronze, if Bronze was the card's original color).

deploy.text: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.

destroy.raw: <#600101>Destroy:</color> Move the card to the Graveyard.
destroy.text: Destroy: Move the card to the Graveyard.

discard.raw: <#600101>Discard:</color> Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.
discard.text: Discard: Move a card from your hand to the graveyard. Note: Related abilities are not triggered when discarding manually.

doomed.raw: <#600101>Doomed:</color> Status that removes the unit from the game after it moves to the graveyard.
doomed.text: Doomed: Status that removes the unit from the game after it moves to the graveyard.

drain.raw: <#600101>Drain:</color> Deal damage and boost self by the same amount.
drain.text: Drain: Deal damage and boost self by the same amount.

draw.raw: <#600101>Draw:</color> Move the top card or cards from your Deck to your Hand.
draw.text: Draw: Move the top card or cards from your Deck to your Hand.

duel.raw: <#600101>Duel:</color> Units take turns dealing damage equal to their power until one of them is destroyed.
duel.text: Duel: Units take turns dealing damage equal to their power until one of them is destroyed.

enemy.raw: <#600101>Enemy:</color> A Unit on your opponent's side of the Board.
enemy.text: Enemy: A Unit on your opponent's side of the Board.

fatigue.raw: <#600101>Single-Use:</color> This card's ability can be used only once per game.
fatigue.text: Single-Use: This card's ability can be used only once per game.

friendly.raw: <#600101>Ally:</color> A Unit on your side of the Board.
friendly.text: Ally: A Unit on your side of the Board.

gamble.text: Gamble: Play a game of chance.

gold.raw: <#600101>Immune:</color> Status whereby this card cannot be targeted.
gold.text: Immune: Status whereby this card cannot be targeted.

hazard.raw: <#600101>Hazard:</color> Negative row effect. Replaced by other row effects and removed on round end.
hazard.text: Hazard: Negative row effect. Replaced by other row effects and removed on round end.

heal.raw: <#600101>Heal:</color> If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.
heal.text: Heal: If a unit's current power is lower than its base power, restore it either to base power or by the amount specified.

highest.raw: <#600101>Highest:</color> Highest power, ties are resolved randomly.
highest.text: Highest: Highest power, ties are resolved randomly.

idle.raw: <#600101>Idle:</color> The number of turns a unit must remain on the board before it can be triggered.
idle.text: Idle: The number of turns a unit must remain on the board before it can be triggered.

immune.raw: <#600101>Immune:</color> Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.
immune.text: Immune: Status whereby this card cannot be manually targeted.

leadership.raw: <#600101>Leadership:</color> Trigger this ability when either Leader card is played (but before the Leader's ability is resolved).
leadership.text: Leadership: Trigger this ability when either Leader card is played (but before the Leader's ability is resolved).

lock.raw: <#600101>Lock:</color> Status that disables a unit's abilities and removes other statuses.
lock.text: Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities and removes other statuses.

lowest.raw: <#600101>Lowest:</color> Lowest power, ties are resolved randomly.
lowest.text: Lowest: Lowest power, ties are resolved randomly.

melee.raw: <#600101>Melee:</color> This ability can only be used while on the melee row.
melee.text: Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row.

mulligan.raw: <#600101>Mulligan:</color> Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck and draw the top card from your Deck.
mulligan.text: Mulligan: Shuffle a card from your hand into your deck and draw the top card from your Deck.

muster.text: Summon: Play automatically from the deck.

non_decoyable.raw: <#600101>Stubborn:</color> Cannot be moved back to the hand.
non_decoyable.text: Stubborn: Cannot be moved back to the hand.

order.raw: <#600101>Order:</color> An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
order.text: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.

overstrain.raw: <#600101>Effort:</color> Perform the specified action for every card targeted by the preceding ability.
overstrain.text: Effort: Perform the specified action for every card targeted by the preceding ability.

pair.raw: <#600101>Pair:</color> Trigger this ability when 2 copies of this card are present on the Board.
pair.text: Pair: Trigger this ability when 2 copies of this card are present on the Board.

promote.raw: <#600101>Promote:</color> Convert the card to Gold until the Round ends.
promote.text: Promote: Convert the card to Gold until the Round ends.

ranged.raw: <#600101>Ranged:</color> This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
ranged.text: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.

reach.raw: <#600101>Reach:</color> The distance in rows that you can target.
reach.text: Reach: The distance in rows that you can target.

regress.raw: <#600101>Regress:</color> Return the card to its original state.
regress.text: Regress: Return the card to its original state.

regressing.raw: <#600101>Regressing:</color> When this Unit is removed from the Board, its base Power is returned to the value it has in the Collection. Not disabled by Lock.
regressing.text: Regressing: When this Unit is removed from the Board, its base Power is returned to the value it has in the Collection. Not disabled by Lock.

reset.raw: <#600101>Reset:</color> Restore a card to its default state (as it would appear in the Deck Builder).
reset.text: Reset: Restore a card to its default state (as it would appear in the Deck Builder).

resilient.raw: <#600101>Resilience:</color> Status that allows a unit to remain on the board at round end, then restores it to base power if boosted.
resilient.text: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the board at round end, then restores it to base power if boosted.

resistant.raw: <#600101>Resistant:</color> A Resistant Unit is not affected by the specified Hazard effect.
resistant.text: Resistant: A Resistant Unit is not affected by the specified Hazard effect.

retaliation.raw: <#600101>Retaliation:</color> Trigger this ability whenever this Unit is Damaged but not sent to the Graveyard.
retaliation.text: Retaliation: Trigger this ability whenever this Unit is Damaged but not sent to the Graveyard.

reveal.raw: <#600101>Reveal:</color> Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.
reveal.text: Reveal: Show a card to both players, then hide it back in the hand or deck.

revealed.raw: <#600101>Revealed:</color> A card in the hand that has been turned over.
revealed.text: Revealed: A card in the hand that has been turned over.

revenge.raw: <#600101>Revenge:</color> Trigger this ability when the card is moved from the Board to the Graveyard during your opponent's turn.
revenge.text: Revenge: Trigger this ability when the card is moved from the Board to the Graveyard during your opponent's turn.

round_end.raw: <#600101>Round End:</color> Trigger this ability when the Round ends.
round_end.text: Round End: Trigger this ability when the Round ends.

seize.raw: <#600101>Seize:</color> Move an enemy to the opposite row.
seize.text: Seize: Move an enemy to the opposite row.

shield.raw: <#600101>Shield:</color> A Shield token protects a Unit from the next effect that Damages, Weakens or sets this Unit to a lower Power.
shield.text: Shield: A Shield token protects a Unit from the next effect that Damages, Weakens or sets this Unit to a lower Power.

solitary.text: Solitary: Trigger this ability if there is only 1 copy of this card on the Board.

spawn.raw: <#600101>Spawn:</color> Add a card to the game.
spawn.text: Spawn: Add a card to the game.

spring.raw: <#600101>Spring:</color> Turn over a face down Ambush card and trigger its ability.
spring.text: Spring: Turn over a face down Ambush card and trigger its ability.

spying.raw: <#600101>Spying:</color> Status for a unit played on or moved to the opposite side of the battlefield.
spying.text: Spying: Status for a unit played on or moved to the opposite side of the battlefield.

strengthen.raw: <#600101>Strengthen:</color> Increase the base power of a unit.
strengthen.text: Strengthen: Increase the base power of a unit.

stubborn.text: Stubborn: Cannot be replayed or returned to the hand.

summon.text: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).

swap.text: Swap: Move a card from hand to deck and draw another in its place during your turn.

thrive.raw: <#600101>Thrive:</color> Boost this unit by 1 whenever an ally with higher power is played.
thrive.text: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 whenever an ally with higher power is played.

timer.raw: <#600101>Timer:</color> Reduce the Timer by 1 every turn while this Unit is on the Board. Trigger the ability when it reaches 0 (at the start or end of the turn). Reset the Timer when the Unit leaves the Board.

token.raw: <#600101>Token:</color> A unit that is removed from the game on round end.
token.text: Token: A unit that is removed from the game on round end.

transform.text: Transform: Convert into a different card.

trio.raw: <#600101>Trio:</color> Exactly 3 Unlocked copies of a Unit on a row.
trio.text: Trio: Exactly 3 Unlocked copies of a Unit on a row.

turn_start.raw: <#600101>Turn Start:</color> Trigger this ability at the start of your turn.
turn_start.text: Turn Start: Trigger this ability at the start of your turn.

veteran.text: Veteran X: At the start of Rounds 2 and 3, Strengthen this Unit by X, wherever it is.

weaken.raw: <#600101>Weaken:</color> Decrease the base power of a unit. If it falls below 1, remove it from the game. Does not trigger Deathwish abilities.
